timeline.message:
SAK-44746 GithubActions test exclusions

Add profile to setup test exclusions and add StatsUpdateManagerTests

timeline.bodyText: doesn't really matter what this profile is called but we dont' really think it's ubuntu related..... i can replicate locally with mysql on mac ......
timeline.author: ottenhoff
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -31,7 +31,7 @@ jobs:
     - name: Build with Maven
       env:
         MAVEN_OPTS: -Djava.awt.headless=true -Dorg.slf4j.simpleLogger.defaultLogLevel=info -Dmaven.wagon.http.retryHandler.count=2 -Dmaven.wagon.http.pool=true
-      run: mvn test --batch-mode
+      run: mvn -PskipBrokenTestsOnUbuntu test --batch-mode

replies.bodyText: its a different failing test on mac that must be configured to run tests with mysql which is not the default, but as you say it doesnt matter.... was just callng it what it was!
replies.author: ern

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                  run: mvn -PskipBrokenTestsOnUbuntu test --batch-mode
          
          
            
                  run: mvn -PskipBrokenTests test --batch-mode
timeline.author: ern
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -31,7 +31,7 @@ jobs:
     - name: Build with Maven
       env:
         MAVEN_OPTS: -Djava.awt.headless=true -Dorg.slf4j.simpleLogger.defaultLogLevel=info -Dmaven.wagon.http.retryHandler.count=2 -Dmaven.wagon.http.pool=true
-      run: mvn test --batch-mode
+      run: mvn -PskipBrokenTestsOnUbuntu test --batch-mode
